summary: A young woman is abducted by a serial killer and kept as his prisoner. She learns to manipulate her captor using his beloved scrapbook, which he forces his victims to write in.
cast: Emily Haack|Tommy Biondo|Todd Tevlin|Elizabeth Hammock|Sam Maiden Jr.|Angelia Sanderson
keywords: serial killer|female pubic hair|woman on top|shower|sexual violence
title: Scrapbook
